name: Acing the Undergrad: Quiz Game
description:
This is a free turn-based quiz game covering the topics in the Acing the Undergrad course for college success. You will fight through 10 levels against enemies that will try to stop you from becoming a successful student!

Credits

Project Manager: Christopher Phu

Programmer: Andrew van der Zel

Sound Engineer: Jonathan Pettus

Artist/Animator: Josh Capriglione

Artist/Animator: Israel Kennedy

Special Thanks: Jonny Westfall
